org.apache.lucene.util

Class GeoDistanceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.GeoDistanceUtils

  • public class GeoDistanceUtils
extends Object
    Reusable geo-spatial distance utility methods.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeoDistanceUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double distanceToDegreesLat(double lat, double distance)
      Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
      static double distanceToDegreesLon(double lat, double distance)
      Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
      static double vincentyDistance(double lonA, double latA, double lonB, double latB)
      Compute the distance between two geo-points using vincenty distance formula Vincenty uses the oblate spheroid whereas haversine uses unit sphere, this will give roughly 22m better accuracy (in worst case) than haversine

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoDistanceUtils

        public GeoDistanceUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • vincentyDistance

        public static final double vincentyDistance(double lonA,
                      double latA,
                      double lonB,
                      double latB)
        Compute the distance between two geo-points using vincenty distance formula Vincenty uses the oblate spheroid whereas haversine uses unit sphere, this will give roughly 22m better accuracy (in worst case) than haversine
        Parameters:
        lonA - longitudinal coordinate of point A (in degrees)
        latA - latitudinal coordinate of point A (in degrees)
        lonB - longitudinal coordinate of point B (in degrees)
        latB - latitudinal coordinate of point B (in degrees)
        Returns:
        distance (in meters) between point A and point B

      • distanceToDegreesLon

        public static double distanceToDegreesLon(double lat,
                          double distance)
        Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
        Parameters:
        lat - latitude to compute delta degrees lon
        distance - distance in meters to convert to degrees lon
        Returns:
        Sloppy distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters

      • distanceToDegreesLat

        public static double distanceToDegreesLat(double lat,
                          double distance)
        Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
        Parameters:
        lat - latitude to compute delta degrees lon
        distance - distance in meters to convert to degrees lon
        Returns:
        Sloppy distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
